name: weird tags
details: next tags may be usable but adding them is questionable
may help in wording in in-game descriptions
empower - empowers other ability/s of hero
empowered - alternative/additional behaviour of skill, adds X effect if empowered e.g. :
skill 1: empowers next skill 2 cast
skill 2: deals damage; empowered: deals more damage
imo key is to add empowered description to skill which gets casted, not one which empowers it (crus, reaper)
self-boost - 'and increases the critical chance of !your! spear attacks toward target by 50% for 30 seconds'
aka something that works but in boundaries of only this hero
movement - dash/teleport/etc which is able to change position of hero
